com.samsung.android.sdk.accessory

Class SAPeerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.accessory.SAPeerAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public class SAPeerAgent
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    This class represents a remote Accessory Peer Agent.

    This class encapsulates the information about a remote Accessory Peer Agent and the Accessory Device that the Accessory Peer Agent runs on. For Accessory Peer Agent information, it includes, for example, the Service Profile Specification version that the Accessory Peer Agent follows and the application name. For Accessory Device information, it includes, for example, the vendor ID, product ID, and device name.

    The application can check such information to decide whether to request a Service Connection with the Accessory Peer Agent, and whether to accept incoming Service Connection requests from the Accessory Peer Agent.

    Developer Guides

    For more information about using Accessory, read the Accessory programming guide.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SAPeerAccessory getAccessory()
      Get the SAPeerAccessory instance hosting this Accessory Peer Agent.
      String getAppName()
      Get the name of the application to which the Accessory Peer Agent belongs.
      int getMaxAllowedDataSize()
      Get the maximum payload size supported for the SASocket.send(int, byte[]) and SASocket.secureSend(int, byte[]) methods.
      String getPeerId()
      Get the Accessory Peer Agent ID.
      String getProfileVersion()
      Get the Service Profile Specification version that the Accessory Peer Agent supports.
